SneakCast 'Socio Video Search'

Internet services
www.sneakcast.com
Utkarsh Sinha, Founder and CTO
SneakCast is social video search engine, based in Mumbai, India. It is a startup company and is growing by leaps and bounds. It can be used to search video clips and streaming media spread all over the World Wide Web (WWW). The algorithm behind SneakCast is different from its competitors, which shows high quality search results. The ranking for each and every video is based on two simple aspects which are 'Algorithm' and 'User Votes'. So, only the most relevant results are displayed on the first page. This gives a fair chance to the users to filter the results themselves. The company is currently in talks with many major media content providers.
History
SneakCast was founded by Utkarsh Sinha, an Electrical and Electronics Engineering graduate in September 2007.
